## R Markdown

```{r cars}

import_files = function(FILEPATH = "FTICR-MS/data/34b1337c-4c0a-433f-8c76-af77b821794f/processed_data/fticr copy"){

  zip_filePaths <- list.files(path = FILEPATH, pattern = ".zip", full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)

  zip_filePaths %>% lapply(unzip)
  

  csv_filePaths <- list.files(#path = FILEPATH, 
                          pattern = "fticrWEOM", full.names = TRUE)
  
  icr_dat <- do.call(bind_rows, lapply(csv_filePaths, function(path) {
    
    data = read.csv(path) %>% mutate(source = basename(path))
    
  }))
  
  file.remove(csv_filePaths)

}


```
